column3: Faculty of Health, Education and Society
column5: If you are a qualified occupational therapist and want to take your professional knowledge and skills to an advanced level to enhance your career prospects and extend your perspective on professional practice, then this MSc in Advanced Occupational Therapy is for you.As one of the longest established Occupational Therapy schools in the UK, we have a very highly regarded professional reputation.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time / 2.5-4.5 years part time
